Text:
If the serial key active Windows, why do I have to remove Watermark?

Just some questions...
If you have a watermark still remaining on the desktop after activating windows 7 use the Plus Patch to remove it. Windows will still be activated afterwards.
Windows 7 does not have a watermark, only the trial versions had it. I suspect the serials are for the early BETA versions.
if that does happen salmanbar1 i recommend using a loader as well just as a precaution as the only things i have found worked are these serials and a loader
